title: Add Lucene index heap size usage in the Solr admin UI
description:
Recently a method was implemented in Lucene to estimate the index heap usage
(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LUCENE-5197). It would be very helpful to display this information in the admin UI.

comments.author: Areek Zillur
comments.content: Attached a patch to display the luceneIndexHeapUsage in the index dashboard, using the newly added attribute in the lukeRequestHandler (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-5237)
